solution_line_template: First find the total amount of money Jackson spent on movie tickets: {num_tickets} tickets * ${price_per_ticket}/ticket = $<<{num_tickets}*{price_per_ticket}={total_movie}>>{total_movie}
Then add the amount he spent on the video game: ${total_movie} + ${game_price} = $<<{total_movie}+{game_price}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}
